name: Introduction to Earth Science
description: An introduction to the field of earth science, covering the basics of geology, oceanography, astronomy, meteorology, and more.

name: Soil Science
description: An in-depth look at the science of soils, including physical, chemical, and biological properties and processes, soil genesis, soil classification, and soil conservation.

name: Soil Chemistry
description: An overview of the chemical properties of soils, including chemical composition, reactions, and environmental fate.

name: Soil Fertility and Plant Nutrition
description: An introduction to the basics of soil fertility and plant nutrition, including plant nutrient requirements, soil testing, and fertilizer management.

name: Soil Physics
description: An introduction to the physical properties of soils, including soil structure, texture, moisture, and temperature.

name: Soil Ecology
description: An introduction to the ecology of soils, including the role of soil organisms, nitrogen cycling, soil biodiversity, and soil conservation.
